sv.purpose: Att med ett enkelt formulär utvärdera nutritionsstatus hos sjukhusvårdade barn.
sv.use:
Använd för att med ett enkelt formulär utvärdera nutritionsstatus hos sjukhusvårdade barn.

STRONGkids är ett screeninginstrument för sjukhusvårdade barn, skapat för att hitta barn i behov av intervention i form av specifikt nutritionsupplägg. Detta enkla formulär genererar en poängsumma resulterandes i riskvärdering och rekommendationer kring åtgärd och uppföljning.

en.purpose: To evaluate nutrition state among hospitalized children using a simple form.
en.use:
Use to evaluate nutrition state among hospitalized children using a simple form. 

The STRONGkids form is a nutritional screening tool for hospitalized children, designed to find children in need of nutrition support. This simple form generates a total score, along with an assessment of risk and recommendations on intervention and follow-up.

other_details.references:
Hulst JM, Zwart H, Hop WC, Joosten KF. Dutch national survey to test the STRONGkids nutritional risk screening tool in hospitalized children. Clin Nutr 2010; 29: 106–111. 

Huysentruyt K, Alliet P, Muyshont L, et al. The STRONG (kids) nutritional screening tool in hospitalized children: a validation study. Nutrition 2013; 29: 1356–1361.

when: $gt0006|3a. Excessive diarrhoea (5 per day) and/or vomiting (>3 times/day) the last few days?|==1|local::at0018|Yes|
$gt0007|3b. Reduced food intake during the last few days before admission (not including fasting for an elective procedure or surgery?)|==1|local::at0020|Yes|
$gt0009|3d. Inability to consume adequate intake because of pain?|==1|local::at0024|Yes|
$gt0006|3a. Excessive diarrhoea (5 per day) and/or vomiting (>3 times/day) the last few days?|==0|local::at0017|No|
$gt0007|3b. Reduced food intake during the last few days before admission (not including fasting for an elective procedure or surgery?)|==0|local::at0019|No|
$gt0009|3d. Inability to consume adequate intake because of pain?|==0|local::at0023|No|
$gt0004|1. Is the patient in a poor nutritional status judged by subjective clinical assessment?|!=null
$gt0005|2. Is there an underlying illness with a risk of malnutrition or expected major surgery?|!=null
$gt0010|4. Is there weight loss or no weight gain (infants <1 year) during the last few weeks/months?|!=null

then: $gt0044|Follow-up|=0|local::at0012|Check weight regularly conform hospital policy and evaluate the nutritional risk after one week.|
$gt0043|Intervention|=1|local::at0009|Consult doctor for full diagnosis; consider nutritional intervention with dietician.|
$gt0044|Follow-up|=1|local::at0013|Check weight twice a week and evaluate the nutritional risk after one week.|
$gt0043|Intervention|=2|local::at0011|Consult doctor and dietician for full diagnosis and individual nutritional advice and follow-up.|
$gt0044|Follow-up|=2|local::at0014|Start prescribing sip feeds until further diagnosis.|

gt0001.description: STRONGkids är ett screeninginstrument för sjukhusvårdade barn, skapat för att hitta barn i behov av intervention i form av specifikt nutritionsupplägg. Detta enkla formulär genererar en poängsumma resulterandes i riskvärdering och rekommendationer kring åtgärd och uppföljning.

gt0004.text: 1.	Baserat på subjektiv klinisk bedömning, är patientens nutritionsstatus nedsatt?
gt0004.description: Subjektiv klinisk bedömning – förlust/nedsatt mängd subkutant fett och/eller muskelmassa och/eller insjunket ansikte?

gt0005.text: 2. Föreligger underliggande sjukdom med risk för malnutrition eller omfattande kirurgi?
gt0005.description: 2. Föreligger underliggande sjukdom med risk för malnutrition eller omfattande kirurgi?

gt0006.text: 3a. Omfattande diarré (5ggr/dag) och/eller kräkning (>3ggr/dag) de senaste dagarna?
gt0006.description: Nutrition, intag och förluster – frågorna 3a-3d genererar tillsammans som mest en poäng (förutsatt att någon föreligger).

gt0007.text: 3b. Reducerat födointag under senaste dagarna innan ankomst till sjukhus (fasta inför kirurgi eller annan vårdinriktad åtgärd ej inkluderat)?
gt0007.description: Nutrition, intag och förluster – frågorna 3a-3d genererar tillsammans som mest en poäng (förutsatt att någon föreligger).

gt0008.description: Nutrition, intag och förluster – frågorna 3a-3d genererar tillsammans som mest en poäng (förutsatt att någon föreligger).

gt0009.text: 3d. Oförmögen att upprätthålla adekvat födointag pga smärta?
gt0009.description: Nutrition, intag och förluster – frågorna 3a-3d genererar tillsammans som mest en poäng (förutsatt att någon föreligger).

gt0010.text: 4. Föreligger viktnedgång eller utebliven viktökning (spädbarn <1 år) under senaste veckorna/månaderna?

gt0042.description: Evaluation of score generated in accordance with the STRONGkids Nutritional Risk Screening tool.

gt0043.description: Recommended intervention based on risk group assessment.

gt0044.description: Recommended follow-up based on risk group assessment.

gt0001.description: The STRONGkids form is a nutritional screening tool for hospitalized children, designed to find children in need of nutrition support. This simple form generates a total score, along with an assessment of risk and recommendations on intervention and follow-up.

gt0004.text: 1. Is the patient in a poor nutritional status judged by subjective clinical assessment?
gt0004.description:
Subjective clinical assessment - diminished subcutaneous fat and/or
muscle mass and/or hollow face?

gt0005.text: 2. Is there an underlying illness with a risk of malnutrition or expected major surgery?
gt0005.description: High risk disease including but not limited to; anorexia, burns, bronchopulmonary dysplasia, celiac disease, cystic fibrosis, prematurity, cardiac disease, infectious disease (AIDS), IBD, cancer, liver/kidney/pancreatic disease, short bowel syndrome, muscle disease, metabolic disease, trauma, mental handicap, expected major surgery.

gt0006.text: 3a. Excessive diarrhoea (5 per day) and/or vomiting (>3 times/day) the last few days?
gt0006.description: Nutritional intake and losses - the questions 3a-3d will together generate a maximum of 1p if any present.

gt0007.text: 3b. Reduced food intake during the last few days before admission (not including fasting for an elective procedure or surgery?)
gt0007.description: Nutritional intake and losses - the questions 3a-3d will together generate a maximum of 1p if any present.

gt0008.description: Nutritional intake and losses - the questions 3a-3d will together generate a maximum of 1p if any present.

gt0009.text: 3d. Inability to consume adequate intake because of pain?
gt0009.description: Nutritional intake and losses - the questions 3a-3d will generate a maximum of 1p if present.

gt0010.text: 4. Is there weight loss or no weight gain (infants <1 year) during the last few weeks/months?
gt0010.description: Weight loss or poor weight gain?

gt0042.description: Evaluation of score generated in accordance with the STRONGkids Nutritional Risk Screening tool.

gt0043.description: Recommended intervention based on risk group assessment.

gt0044.description: Recommended follow-up based on risk group assessment.
